Lorem API

The simplest dummy text API

Overview

Lorem API provides dummy text in plain text format. Specify the desired number of characters, and receive a response with your requested dummy content.

Endpoint

GET https://loremapi.netlify.app/ipsum

Parameters

  • length: number (optional, range: 0-1,000,000) - Specify the number of characters you need.

Response

Returns dummy text of up to the specified length. If length is not specified, the response defaults to 4075 characters.

Content-Type: text/plain

Designed with simplicity in mind. Powered by Lorem API.
